product_name: Quiksilver Square Root 4 Board Shorts - Men's
long_description: With a specialized fabric that reduces clinging and rashing, the radically plaid Quiksilver Square Root 4 board shorts keep you comfortable and having fun during long, sunny sessions at the beach. Quick-drying polyester provides comfortable 2-way stretch. Specialized raised diamond pattern on interior of fabric reduces contact with skin to reduce rashing and clinging. Rip-and-stick leg pocket features a shockcorded key keeper and quick-draining grommets. Quiksilver Square Root 4 board shorts feature a traditional board-shorts closure with rip-and-stick fly. Hand wash in cold water.
short_description: With a specialized fabric that reduces clinging and rashing, the radically plaid Quiksilver Square Root 4 board shorts keep you comfortable and having fun during long, sunny sessions at the beach.
